data.message: Read the fine print people.  This a complete fucking rip off scheme.  MM should be be ashamed of himself.  First of all $500 pay for an Eminem album cover is a fucking rip off.  What's in the prize pack?  A golden dildo?  And read the fine print.  Unless you write to them...they get to use every single one of the submissions for free.    This is bullshit.  White America fucking bullshit.
